snippet.title: Twistales, Forever After - Official Demo Launch Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description:
Twistales, Forever After is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by CatOnTree Studio. The game is a dark twist on the classic Cinderella story, with Cinderella as a magical warrior fighting against evil in a dark fantasy realm. The game is currently in pre-alpha development, with a Kickstarter campaign underway to raise funds for its completion.


The game's official website describes the story as follows:


Twistales, Forever After is a dark retelling of the classic Cinderella story, set in a twisted fairytale world. In this world, Cinderella is a magical warrior who must fight against evil to save her kingdom.


The game features fast-paced action combat, exploration of a dark fantasy realm, and a gripping story full of twists and turns.


The game's Kickstarter campaign was launched on August 4, 2023, and has already raised over 50% of its goal. The campaign is set to close on September 3, 2023.


Twistales, Forever After is scheduled for release in 2025.
